name: Supported SCIM User attributes
description:
Name

Type

Description

`userName`

`string`

The username for the user

`name.givenName`

`string`

User first name

`name.lastName`

`string`

User last name

`emails`

`array`

List of user emails

`externalId`

`string`

External identifier (generated by the SAML SSO provider)

`id`

`string`

Identifier generated by the GitHub SCIM endpoint

`active`

`boolean`

Used to indicate whether the identity is active (true) or should be deprovisioned (false)

Note: Endpoints for the SCIM API are case sensitive: the first letter in the `Users` endpoint must be capitalized. For example:

    GET /scim/v2/organizations/:organization/Users/:id

params.name: externalId
params.description: External identifier (generated by the SAML SSO provider)

params.name: id
params.description: Identifier generated by the GitHub SCIM endpoint

params.name: active
params.description: Used to indicate whether the identity is active (true) or should be deprovisioned (false)
